ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Pet focus item quests
ygData.msgSnippet: One other thing I just thought about.  I did not fight for the Griffon Feather. I bought it from a vendor, as well as the Ruby.  I feel confident it is okay to
ygData.messageBody:
One other thing I just thought about. I did not fight for the Griffon
Feather. I bought it from a vendor, as well as the Ruby. I feel confident it
is okay to use a bought Ruby, but not so confident about the Griffon Feather.
Any thoughts?


On Monday 23 December 2002 09:20, Rob LeBeau wrote:
> I heard that maybe one of these DOES matter the order
> in which she is given things.
>
> I will check a couple of resources to see if that is
> true and if there is any mention of the order.
>
> It will help me too since I have a 32 level Human
> mage.
>
> Will let you know
>
> Rob
>
> --- Jack Whaley <jdwhaley@...> wrote:
> > I have a mage that is doing the pet focus item
> > quests that are given by Vira
> >
> > in Solusek's Eye, and I have already turned in the
> >
> > required items and
> >
> > received my Stein of Ulissa. However, when I tried
> >
> > to turn in the items for
> >
> > my Broom of Trillion, Vira told me that Solusek Ro
> >
> > did not accept half
> >
> > measures, kept my items, and did not give me the
> >
> > focus item.
> >
> > She evidently felt that I had somehow failed to
> >
> > properly fulfill the quest,
> >
> > yet I am certain I gave her all the correct items.
> >
> > When offering her an item,
> >
> > the 4-slot trade-box opens with that item in the
> >
> > first slot. Does it matter
> >
> > what order the items are placed in the slots?
> >
> > The other thing I wonder about is that after I
> >
> > turned in my items and received
> >
> > the stein, I talked to her about all of the other
> >
> > focus quests. I do not
> >
> > remember what order we discussed them, but could she
> >
> > only be remembering the
> >
> > last one we discussed and it was not for the broom?
> >
> > Canostrol
> >
> > 32 Gnome Mage
> > Bristlebane
>
> i
>
